name: Laura Wrong
coverLetter:
I've been trimming for 5 years now, and can trim up to 2lbs. a day. I am willing to travel, but just need a floor to sleep on or a place to pitch a tent. I can bring my own food, and on past jobs have worked partially as the group chef. I am happy to help with harvest if needed as well. 

Arielle (831) 325-6360
